<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ce6db0273f2c4359f48d75103a42991aa481f14e|patch 8.2.0097: crash with autocommand and spellfile>
patch 8.2.0097: crash with autocommand and spellfile

Problem:    Crash with autocommand and spellfile. (Tim Pope)
Solution:   Do not pop exestack when not pushed. (closes #5450)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0097: crash with autocommand and spellfile · vim/vim@ce6db02
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0097: crash with autocommand and spellfile · vim/vim@ce6db02
attachments.text: Problem: Crash with autocommand and spellfile. (Tim Pope) Solution: Do not pop exestack when not pushed. (closes #5450)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/e31ee86859528a7ffe00405645547d494e522fa8|patch 8.2.0098: exe stack length can be wrong without being detected>
patch 8.2.0098: exe stack length can be wrong without being detected

Problem:    Exe stack length can be wrong without being detected.
Solution:   Add a check when ABORT_ON_INTERNAL_ERROR is defined.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0098: exe stack length can be wrong without being detected · vim/vim@e31ee86
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0098: exe stack length can be wrong without being detected · vim/vim@e31ee86
attachments.text: Problem: Exe stack length can be wrong without being detected. Solution: Add a check when ABORT_ON_INTERNAL_ERROR is defined.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/8b7aa2f9b238df916c161cdacda032c25d72a0ae|patch 8.2.0099: use of NULL pointer when out of memory>
patch 8.2.0099: use of NULL pointer when out of memory

Problem:    Use of NULL pointer when out of memory.
Solution:   Check for NULL pointer. (Dominique Pelle, closes #5449)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0099: use of NULL pointer when out of memory · vim/vim@8b7aa2f
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0099: use of NULL pointer when out of memory · vim/vim@8b7aa2f
attachments.text: Problem: Use of NULL pointer when out of memory. Solution: Check for NULL pointer. (Dominique Pelle, closes #5449)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/41a4141ecb36cd871c6e87f6fbc12fa81653b6be|patch 8.2.0100: macros for Ruby are too complicated>
patch 8.2.0100: macros for Ruby are too complicated

Problem:    Macros for Ruby are too complicated.
Solution:   Do not use DYNAMIC_RUBY_VER, use RUBY_VERSION. (Ken Takata,
            closes #5452)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0100: macros for Ruby are too complicated · vim/vim@41a4141
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0100: macros for Ruby are too complicated · vim/vim@41a4141
attachments.text: Problem: Macros for Ruby are too complicated. Solution: Do not use DYNAMIC_RUBY_VER, use RUBY_VERSION. (Ken Takata, closes #5452)
